mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `supplier`, `contacts`, `telephone`, `phone_num`, `email`, `begin_need_pay`, `all_need_pay`, `all_need_pay`, `tax_rate`, `enabled` FROM `jsh_erp`.`jsh_supplier` WHERE `type` ='供应商' AND supplier LIKE CONCAT('%', #{supplierName}, '%') AND telephone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{telephone}, '%') AND phone_num LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phoneNumber}, '%') LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
